video.synopsis: Siblings Annie and Dixon deal with nonstop drama at their exclusive new high school, where tumultuous friendships and roller coaster romances rule.

episodes.synopsis: Annie and Dixon Mills start school at West Beverly Hills High. / Naomi finds herself in hot water after failing an assignment.
episodes.title: We're Not in Kansas Anymore / The Jet Set

episodes.synopsis: Annie and Dixon's plans for Friday night are stalled when they learn about Harry and Debbie's family bowling night.
episodes.title: Lucky Strike

episodes.synopsis: Harry learns that West Beverly Hills High's theater director will not be able to direct the school musical, leading Tabitha to offer her time.
episodes.title: The Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Annie and Ty spend an increasing amount of time together as the opening night of "Spring Awakening" rapidly approaches.
episodes.title: Wide Awake and Dreaming

episodes.synopsis: When Debbie is given the opportunity to shoot a fashion show for Nylon Magazine, Annie uses the event for a school project.
episodes.title: Model Behavior

episodes.synopsis: Annie and Ethan get paired up for a class project where they must take care of a baby. The time together forces them to see each other in a new light.
episodes.title: Hollywood Forever

episodes.synopsis: As Annie prepares for her driver's test, she and Ethan make plans to go to the Homecoming dance. Adrianna confesses the truth about her drug use.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Harry and Debbie reveal to Annie and Dixon that Harry had a son given up for adoption 22 years ago. Meanwhile, Silver hosts a girls' night.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Naomi grows spiteful as Annie and Ethan grow closer, causing her to deliver an unwelcome surprise at Annie's Sweet 16 party.
episodes.title: Games People Play

episodes.synopsis: Annie and Naomi call a truce due to the appearance of their half-brother Sean, who unexpectedly arrives in town.
episodes.title: That Which We Destroy

episodes.synopsis: Debbie, Harry, Annie, Dixon and Sean have a family game night, but Annie becomes suspicious of Sean after she overhears a phone call.
episodes.title: Hello, Goodbye, Amen

episodes.synopsis: Debbie and Tabitha clash after Tabitha surprises Annie and Dixon with a new car. Adrianna begins to open up to Naomi about her secret.
episodes.title: Love Me or Leave Me

episodes.synopsis: Coping with her decision about her baby and her baby's father, Adrianna turns to Naomi and Kelly for support.
episodes.title: By Accident

episodes.synopsis: Adrianna reveals her pregnancy to the baby's father and is shocked by his parents' reaction. Naomi stands by Adrianna's side while they devise a plan.
episodes.title: Help Me, Rhonda

episodes.synopsis: Naomi is intrigued by a mystery man who shows up at her home. Silver and Dixon still get together despite her Valentine's Day plans falling through.
episodes.title: Of Heartbreaks and Hotels

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to get close to Liam, Naomi offers to be his math tutor, but she gets more than she bargains for when he takes her out for a wild night.
episodes.title: Life's a Drag

episodes.synopsis: Ryan heads out to calm down Silver after her video airs, but she disappears. Dixon talks to his shocked parents.
episodes.title: Off the Rails

episodes.synopsis: Kelly and Silver are shocked when Donna arrives in town. Annie and Dixon take a road trip to visit someone from Dixon's past.
episodes.title: Okaeri, Donna! (Welcome Home, Donna!)

episodes.synopsis: Now that they sold their home in Kansas, Harry and Debbie have a yard sale, Beverly Hills-style. Meanwhile, Donna talks to Kelly about her separation.
episodes.title: Between a Sign and a Hard Place

episodes.synopsis: While moving in with the Wilsons, Naomi discovers that her older sister has returned. Adrianna and Navid tell their future plans to his parents.
episodes.title: The Dionysian Debacle

episodes.synopsis: Adrianna and Navid don't get the reaction they expected after revealing their plans to their friends. Annie and Silver throw Adrianna a bridal shower.
episodes.title: The Party's Over

episodes.synopsis: Naomi drops concerns over Jen's overspending after being asked to the prom by Liam. Meanwhile, Annie goes to the prom with a geek to prove Liam wrong.
episodes.title: Zero Tolerance

episodes.synopsis: A post-prom party is being held at Naomi's home, and she has a fit after walking in on Liam.
episodes.title: One Party Can Ruin Your Whole Summer

episodes.synopsis: Forced to attend summer school following the police crashing Naomi's after-prom party, Naomi, Silver and Adrianna form a tight bond with one another.
episodes.title: To New Beginnings!

episodes.synopsis: Naomi, still upset at Annie, considers sending out a mass sexually explicit text to get back at her.
episodes.title: To Sext or Not to Sext

episodes.synopsis: Annie, humiliated by the mass sext message, sets out to prove that Naomi sent the message.
episodes.title: Sit Down, You're Rocking the Boat

episodes.synopsis: Dixon and Sasha head to Napa for the weekend, but a flat tire on the way home leads to a trunk of porn as well as growing lies.
episodes.title: The Porn King

episodes.synopsis: Naomi learns that her test scores may not be high enough for her to be accepted into CU.
episodes.title: Environmental Hazards

episodes.synopsis: Kelly and Silver deal with news that their mother, Jackie, is suffering from breast cancer.
episodes.title: Wild Alaskan Salmon

episodes.synopsis: It's Halloween, and Adrianna channels Marilyn Monroe to help deal with her broken relationship with Navid.
episodes.title: Unmasked

episodes.synopsis: Navid and Gia launch an investigation into student drug use at West Beverly, which leads them to Annie's boyfriend, Jasper.
episodes.title: Women's Intuition

episodes.synopsis: With the help of Teddy, Jackie surprises Silver with a half-birthday celebration that takes her back to her childhood birthday parties.
episodes.title: A Trip to the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Annie leaves Debbie and Harry surprised when she informs them that she would like to invite Jasper over for dinner.
episodes.title: To Thine Own Self Be True

episodes.synopsis: Navid has no memory of who pushed him down the stairs. Adrianna visits Navid at the hospital, which leads her to make a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: And Away They Go!

episodes.synopsis: Navid, thinking Jasper pushed him down the stairs, asks Adrianna to help him reveal Jasper for what he is.
episodes.title: Winter Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Naomi returns from her vacation in St. Barth's excited to spend time with Liam, which leads to the two getting up close and personal in his new boat.
episodes.title: Rats & Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Naomi enlists Ivy's help in reducing the awkwardness with Liam, and the three decide to go on a hike -- something Naomi has never done.
episodes.title: Girl Fight

episodes.synopsis: Gia encourages Adrianna to audition for a new band and admits she has a crush on Adrianna.
episodes.title: What's Past Is Prologue

episodes.synopsis: Naomi immediately butts heads with the Blaze's new faculty adviser, Mr. Cannon, and is reprimanded in front of her peers.
episodes.title: Clark Raving Mad

episodes.synopsis: Annie tries to cope with Jasper's decision; driven by jealousy, Dixon and Ivy decide to go on a fake date.
episodes.title: Sweaty Palms and Weak Knees

episodes.synopsis: Naomi's little white lie has become the talk of the school. When she's forced to testify in front of the school board, she drops a bomb.
episodes.title: Another Another Chance

episodes.synopsis: As a result of falsely accusing her faculty adviser of sexual harassment, Naomi is now required to complete community service.
episodes.title: Multiple Choices

episodes.synopsis: Adrianna struggles to write a new song for Laurel and turns to Navid for support, forcing Navid to realize he still has feelings for her.
episodes.title: Meet the Parent

episodes.synopsis: Adrianna's new romance with pop star Javier continues to blossom, while Navid continues to work up enough courage to tell her how he feels.
episodes.title: Javianna

episodes.synopsis: Teddy seeks revenge after learning that Spence tried to bribe Silver; Liam and Annie share their darkest secrets; Ryan receives a mysterious package.
episodes.title: Confessions

episodes.synopsis: A deadly earthquake strikes Beverly Hills. Naomi tries to cope with her rape, and the Wilsons struggle with Harry's absence.
episodes.title: Senior Year, Baby

episodes.synopsis: Naomi learns that she can access the money in her trust fund, so she decides to throw a huge birthday bash.
episodes.title: Age of Inheritance

episodes.synopsis: Silver accepts an invitation from Mr. Cannon to watch his new documentary at his apartment, and he secretly slips something in her drink.
episodes.title: 2021 Vision

episodes.synopsis: Silver hosts a cancer-awareness charity event to honor her mother and convinces Navid, Dixon, Liam and Teddy to appear in a bachelor auction.
episodes.title: The Bachelors

episodes.synopsis: Silver, Naomi, and Adrianna devise a plan to prove that Mr. Cannon raped Naomi, but they underestimate his ability to control the situation.
episodes.title: Catch Me If You Cannon

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Jen learn about Naomi's rape, and Jen decides to handle the situation herself. Liam starts working as a shirtless window model.
episodes.title: How Much Is That Liam in the Window?

episodes.synopsis: Ryan tries to convince Naomi to press charges against Mr. Cannon and prepares himself for the possible repercussions.
episodes.title: I See London, I See France

episodes.synopsis: Victor arranges for Adrianna to attend her magazine premiere party with Joe Jonas to help boost her image, forcing Adrianna to un-invite Navid.
episodes.title: Mother Dearest

episodes.synopsis: Navid turns to Silver when he and his father argue over his father using underage girls in his movies.
episodes.title: They're Playing Her Song

episodes.synopsis: Naomi develops a crush on Zach, one of Ivy's surfer friends, and pretends to know how to surf in order to get closer to him.
episodes.title: Best Lei'd Plans

episodes.synopsis: Adrianna rents a mansion and throws an extravagant housewarming party, but Victor decides to reveal Adrianna's secrets to the media.
episodes.title: Holiday Madness

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Cannon takes Naomi hostage in her own home and manages to pull Silver into the situation.
episodes.title: Liars

episodes.synopsis: Naomi, Silver, Adrianna, and Annie go on a road trip to Ojai for a girls' weekend at a yoga retreat.
episodes.title: It's Getting Hot in Here

episodes.synopsis: Navid's opinion changes when he learns how Adrianna used the baby she gave up for adoption. Meanwhile, Adrianna learns some shocking new information.
episodes.title: All About a Boy

episodes.synopsis: Dixon and Navid convince a producer to shoot a music video for Nelly at Shirazi Studios. Emily tries to distract Annie so she can get closer to Liam.
episodes.title: Revenge with the Nerd

episodes.synopsis: Emily continues her old tricks and interferes with Annie's internship at the playhouse and her relationship with Liam.
episodes.title: It's High Time

episodes.synopsis: Navid and Dixon formalize their partnership at Shirazi Studios, and a chance run-in with Snoop Dogg could mean good news for their business.
episodes.title: Blue Naomi

episodes.synopsis: Chaos ensues when the group takes a spring break trip to Mexico. Naomi invites Max, telling everyone that she needs extra tutoring.
episodes.title: The Enchanted Donkey

episodes.synopsis: Naomi worries that Max might be cheating on her, so she follows him to an academic decathlon to confront him.
episodes.title: Nerdy Little Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Annie talks Marla into attending a Hollywood premiere of one of Marla's old movies, and Ryan receives a surprise visit.
episodes.title: Women on the Verge

episodes.synopsis: As the gang prepares for prom, Dixon and Annie learn some troubling news about their futures. Adrianna tries to rekindle her romance with Navid.
episodes.title: The Prom Before the Storm

episodes.synopsis: With graduation approaching, Naomi makes a decision that might prevent her from graduating with the rest of her class.
episodes.title: To the Future!

episodes.synopsis: Naomi discovers she doesn't have the status at college that she did in high school. Annie receives some unexpected news that keeps her in town.
episodes.title: Up in Smoke

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to re-gain her status, Naomi rushes a popular sorority. Annie learns a shocking secret about new guy Jeremy that could affect her future.
episodes.title: Rush Hour

episodes.synopsis: Naomi recruits unusual allies to help exact  revenge against sorority president Holly, while Annie must come up with the cash for sorority dues.
episodes.title: Greek Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: Dixon is tempted by drugs when he's in a crunch to finish his recording session. Silver shoots a commercial for Liam's bar.
episodes.title: Let the Games Begin

episodes.synopsis: Austin's excessive pursuit of Naomi gets her locked out of her own party.
episodes.title: Party Politics

episodes.synopsis: Naomi finds herself jealous of Austin's partner for a talent show to raise money for Raj's experimental cancer treatment.
episodes.title: Benefit of the Doubt

episodes.synopsis: Liam is offered a modeling contract while Naomi and Holly battle over a masquerade party. Annie has her doubts about her relationship with Patrick.
episodes.title: It's the Great Masquerade, Naomi Clark

episodes.synopsis: Naomi surprises Austin in Las Vegas when she shows up for his birthday, along with the rest of the gang.
episodes.title: Vegas, Maybe?

episodes.synopsis: Annie and Patrick disagree over whether he should be able to see other women when he's out of town, until Annie needs money to pay for Dixon's rehab.
episodes.title: A Thousand Words

episodes.synopsis: Dixon returns from rehab and Annie advises him to lie about where he's been. Liam throws Thanksgiving dinner at Naomi's place.
episodes.title: Smoked Turkey

episodes.synopsis: Dixon's roommate from rehab shows up and Ade worries that it will cause a relapse. Naomi and Holly compete in a fashion competition.
episodes.title: Project Runaway

episodes.synopsis: Holly's mother, Rachel, hires Naomi as her new intern. Annie breaks into Jeremy's apartment to steal Marla's necklace back.
episodes.title: O Holly Night

episodes.synopsis: Rachel is embarrassed in front of her boss, Dixon and Adrianna realize working together is a bad idea, and Silver goes to the next level with Greg.
episodes.title: Should Old Aquaintance Be Forgot?

episodes.synopsis: Annie forces Vanessa to come clean with Liam. Silver's new boyfriend asks her to move to New York City.
episodes.title: Mama Can You Hear Me?

episodes.synopsis: Liam asks Naomi to oversee Vanessa's spending on their big bar party. Dixon is under suspicion for the fire that burned down the sorority house.
episodes.title: Trust, Truth and Traffic

episodes.synopsis: Liam's agent quits after Vanessa interferes. Annie tries to help Naomi reconnect with Navid.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: Naomi's gold-digging sister shows up for a surprise visit while Adriana and Dixon vie for a producer's attention for a new film.
episodes.title: Babes in Toyland

episodes.synopsis: Naomi and her sister compete for the attentions of a new man while Dixon's performance at the Desert Valley Music Festival leads to an offer.
episodes.title: Blood Is Thicker Than Mud

episodes.synopsis: Dixon's collapse due to stress prompts a diagnosis that may change his career while Silver faces her own medical crisis.
episodes.title: The Heart Will Go On

episodes.synopsis: Naomi is close to giving her heart to P.J. when she finds out he may have other motives in their relationship.
episodes.title: Blue Ivy

episodes.synopsis: Everyone worries that Naomi is rushing to get married while Austin returns to Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Bride and Prejudice

episodes.synopsis: Diego breaks Ivy out of the mental hospital only to get them arrested. Navid confronts Liam about Silver.
episodes.title: Tis Pity

episodes.synopsis: After Naomi tries to sabotage the bachelorette party she has to host for Max's fiancée, Madison, Madison's old crush makes a surprise appearance.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Parties

episodes.synopsis: Naomi shocks everyone when she announces she won't be able to oversee Max's wedding because she's leaving for New York to start a new job.
episodes.title: Forever Hold Your Peace

episodes.synopsis: Naomi and Max's elopement hits some speedbumps while Liam gets in over his head after a fire at the bar.
episodes.title: Til Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: Adrianna finds that she can't escape her Vegas fling while Dixon enters physical therapy with Annie at his side.
episodes.title: The Sea Change

episodes.synopsis: Silver proceeds with her plans to have a baby on her own with full support of her friends.
episodes.title: It's All Fun and Games

episodes.synopsis: Naomi plans a romantic getaway with Max, intending to disclose that Alec kissed her.
episodes.title: Into the Wild

episodes.synopsis: Liam hires Lindsey's law firm, but tells them that Lindsey must personally handle his affairs while Dixon struggles to recover from his accident.
episodes.title: Hate 2 Love

episodes.synopsis: Lindsey and Liam are keeping the relationship under wraps while Navid tries to expose them.
episodes.title: The Con

episodes.synopsis: Annie agrees to support Dixon's new record label financially while Dixon's doctor breaks the news that he needs a risky operation.
episodes.title: 99 Problems

episodes.synopsis: Naomi corrals her friends to attend West Beverly's Homecoming weekend events in order to impress the elite alumni group.
Liam is being blackmailed, so Annie loans him some money to trap the crook.
episodes.title: The Things We Do for Love

episodes.synopsis: A shocking confrontation between Annie and Ashley as she tries to defend Liam leads to a life and death struggle.
episodes.title: Misery Loves Company

episodes.synopsis: While Annie is in surgery, she dreams of the different life she would have had if she'd stayed in Kansas.
episodes.title: We're Not Not in Kansas Anymore

episodes.synopsis: Naomi and Silver plan the Little Miss Beverly Hills pagaent and hire Adrianna as the entertainment.
episodes.title: Here Comes Honey Bye Bye

episodes.synopsis: Naomi and Max have a rocky road in the early days of their separation. Teddy and Silver deal with their desire to become parents.
episodes.title: #realness

episodes.synopsis: Liam must face Ashley in court for his kidnapping while Silver may be micromanaging the young woman who has agreed to be her surrogate.
episodes.title: Brother from Another Mother

episodes.synopsis: Liam tries to brew his own beer while Naomi and Mark work toward opening their restaurant. Dixon convinces Michaela to join his record label.
episodes.title: Strange Brew

episodes.synopsis: Liam complicates his new surf shop venture by becoming involved with one of his investors. Silver's forced to get creative to complete a music video.
episodes.title: Life's a Beach

episodes.synopsis: Naomi may be more upset about her divorce than she lets on.
episodes.title: Dude, Where's My Husband?

episodes.synopsis: Naomi goes to great lengths to find out who wrote a tell-all sex book. Dixon confesses his feelings for Michaela, but she's got eyes for someone else.
episodes.title: Portrait of the Artist as a Young Call Girl

episodes.synopsis: Naomi goes to New York with Annie, Mark and Silver to attend a fundraiser and impress Jordan's mother.
episodes.title: The Empire Strikes Back

episodes.synopsis: Jordan tries to help Mark get out of jail, but ends up making a deal with his mother that he may not be able to keep.
episodes.title: You Can't Win 'Em All

episodes.synopsis: Naomi tries to get back into Jordan's mother's good graces while Silver braces for more test results from the doctor.
episodes.title: Scandal Royale

episodes.synopsis: "90210" actors and executive producers bid farewell to their famous zip code in a look back at the show's most unforgettable moments.
episodes.title: Retrospective

episodes.synopsis: The gang puts their relatively carefree days at West Beverly High behind them and launches into adulthood -- with only their friendships to lean on.
episodes.title: We All Fall Down
